code: import React from"react";import{ListGroupItem}from"reactstrap";import"../../../styles/cart-item.css";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{cartActions}from"../../../store/shopping-cart/cartSlice";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CartItem=_ref=>{let{item}=_ref;const{id,title,price,image01,quantity,totalPrice}=item;const dispatch=useDispatch();const incrementItem=()=>{dispatch(cartActions.addItem({id,title,price,image01}));};const decreaseItem=()=>{dispatch(cartActions.removeItem(id));};const deleteItem=()=>{dispatch(cartActions.deleteItem(id));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListGroupItem,{className:"border-0 cart__item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart__item-info d-flex gap-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image01,alt:"product-img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart__product-info w-100 d-flex align-items-center gap-4 justify-content-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h6",{className:"cart__product-title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:" d-flex align-items-center gap-5 cart__product-price",children:[quantity,"x ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["$",totalPrice]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:" d-flex align-items-center justify-content-between increase__decrease-btn",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"increase__btn",onClick:incrementItem,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"ri-add-line"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"quantity",children:quantity}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"decrease__btn",onClick:decreaseItem,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"ri-subtract-line"})})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"delete__btn",onClick:deleteItem,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"ri-close-line"})})]})]})});};export default CartItem;
